definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Now, some people might look down on worm's nechanics, call it immoral.
sentences.chinese: 可能有些人看不起蟲子出老千，認爲這是不道德的。

sentences.english: Is an invitation, to participate in the games, a cheat.
sentences.chinese: 就是別人邀請，參加牌局，在場上出老千嘛。

definition: pai gow (gambling game played with dominoes)
(of a villain) to do the dirty on another villain
gambling get-together/game of cards, mahjong etc
